text: cypress has been politically divided for
half a century and physically divided
since 1974
that's when turkey launched an invasion
it said it had no choice it was there to

larger Greek Cypriot community inspired

homes they lost their businesses the UN

two parts and it stayed that way ever
since why should we care well you have
to remember the Cyprus is a member of

that is divided in the way that Cyprus
is is always going to be a problem that
does seem to be quite a bit of optimism
